articles.title: Virat Kohli-Anushka Sharma expecting second child? Here's what AB de Villiers reveals | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The exact reason for Virat Kohli's absence for the field is unknown, now his close friend and former South African batter AB de Villiers has revealed something that may give some clarity. Check what he says.
articles.content: India's star batter Virat Kohli has been out of action for the two Tests against England, citing personal reasons. In January too, he excused himself for the first T20I match against Afghanistan for … [+2570 chars]
